department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
short_summary: National Research Council Canada, Building M-6 structural repairs
duration_in_months: The successful bidder will perform concrete beam column and wall remediation in the Council’s Building M-6. The contract term will vary according to the scope of work presented by the bidder.
